name: Ball Monster
description:
This is a submission for Ludum Dare game jam 46. The theme was "Keep it alive". Save your little friend from the darkness! Throw him against buttons and jump across spikes. All while trying not to kill your friend or yourself.(We recommend playing the downloaded version of the game, as the browser version is quite buggy)

CONTROLS:

A/D or Left/Right keys - Left/Right movement

W or Up key - Jump (press again for double-jump)

Spacebar - Throw Monster Ball

R - Restart Level

F11 - Fullscreen
